greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of Laguerre(n, -1).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..449
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {x = 'x + O('x^nn); v = exp(x/(1-x))/(1-x); for (n=0, nn-1, print1(denominator(polcoeff(v, n)), ", "););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 27 2015
(PARI) for(n=0,30, print1(denominator(sum(k=0,n, binomial(n,k)*(1/k!))), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, May 06 2018
(MAGMA) [Denominator((&+[Binomial(n,k)*(1/Factorial(k)): k in [0..n]])): n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, May 06 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 14 2009
